posts.message:
Hey Guys, My Company Is looking for a Project Manager who Lead matrix team of people who have responsibility for strategy, business requirements, technical design including systems and application development, testing and legacy systems integration. 

What we need for this position:

- At least 4+ years of project management experience preferably with Web Development
- Strong communication skills both written and verbal
- Strong leadership skills and ability to self-manage
- Ability to prioritize and meet strict deadlines
- Understanding of web development phases

What you'll be doing:

- Will be responsible for multiple long-term and short-term projects , Customer facing, gathering specifications and communicating effectively to the development team
- Manage, interface and define responsibilities

Location : Cairo, Egypt

What's in it for you:

- Competitive pay and a great benefit package
- Join a growing technological company whose business is based off innovation

 Kindly send your resume to jobs@nuitex.com

posts.message:
A company in Egypt is looking for senior SharePoint developers with the following qualifications:

1. 1+ years experience with SharePoint
2. Presentable (means you look good and can dress up). 
3. Very Good command of English
4. You will work with customers directly

mail me at msamy@Sufigeeks.org
